sources.title: Winterset
sources.description: Years after the execution of his father, a young man convinced of his innocence searches for evidence to prove it.

sources.title: Winterset (1936)
sources.description: A man is determined to find the real culprit behind the crime for which his father was wrongly executed. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/winterset-1936/

sources.title: Winterset (1936) BURGESS MEREDITH
sources.description:
Stars: Burgess Meredith, Margo and Eduardo Ciannelli
Director: Alfred Santell

When a radical Immigrant is falsely condemned and executed for a payroll robbery, years later, his son ets out to find the truth..

metadata.Plot: Immigrant radical Bartolomeo Romagna is falsely condemned and executed for a payroll robbery. Years later, his son Mio sets out to find the truth of the crime and to bring to account the gangster Trock Estrella.
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 2 wins & 4 nominations total
